descript.abstract: The Component Potential Windbreak table lists the windbreak plant species commonly recommended for the referenced map unit component. A windbreak plant listed in this table may be used alone or in combination with other plants.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Windbreak tree height at age 20 years.
A non-connotative string of characters used to uniquely identify a record in the Component Potential Windbreak table.
A generally accepted common name used for a plant in a geographic region, usually a state.
The unique identifier of a record in the Component table. Use this column to join the Component Potential Windbreak table to the Component table.
The full genus and species name as listed in the PLANTS Database, USDA-NRCS, National Plant Data Center.
Windbreak tree height at age 20 years.
Windbreak tree height at age 20 years.
A unique symbol used to identify a plant genus or a plant species. (The PLANTS Database, USDA-NRCS, National Plant Data Center.)

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
